content: diagonal dishcloth by ananda judkins materials - 100% cotton yarn worsted weight - size h crochet hook or hook recommended for your yarn - yarn needle terms st = stitch chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase decrease = single_crochet 2 together decrease approx finished size 9 5 x 9 5 gauge is not important work in the back loops for the entire pattern pattern chain 4 turn row 1 single_crochet in each st chain 1 and turn 3 sts row 2-22 single_crochet increase in first st single_crochet in each st across single_crochet increase in last st chain 1 and turn stitch count for row 22 is 45 sts row 23-44 decrease single_crochet in each st across to last 2 sts decrease when you re left with 3 sts fasten_off and weave in ends etsy shop http //www etsy com/shop/needleandfriend ref=si_shop contact ananda473 at hotmail dot com
